name: Yobuds
description:
What is Yobuds?

Pull up sprouts to grow in numbers, but watch out for falling seeds!

Try your best to keep your sprout squad as big as possible.

How high can you get your score?

A GAME BY:

  • @noahnewline
  • @heynatking

Sound Design by Vaughn McWhorter

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46
